body.name: Floor Lamps for Living Room,SIBRILLE Modern Stepless Dimmable Standing Lamp 3000-6000K,20W LED Rotatable Reading Light,Touch&Remote Control Uplighter Floor Lamp for Living Room Bedroom Office
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 11 hrs 50 mins
features: 【Contemporary Standing Lamp】The floor lamp for living room is stylish and elegant in appearance and exquisite in craftsmanship. This tall lamp is a work of art that lights up home life and beautifies living room and bedroom. The base fits under most couches, recliners, and chairs, which means you can get light over the sectional without it taking up extra room.

【Stepless Dimmable Floor Lamp】The tall LED floor lamp can be dimmed from 5% to 100% and also adjusted from warm white 3000 Kelvin to 6000 Kelvin cold white. There are two adjustable lamp parts, which can be twisted at will so that the light is well distributed in the room.

【Energy Saving and Two Control Methods】SIBRILLE 20W uplighter floor lamp, which up to 1300 lumens (equal to 100 watt incandescent), energy saving. The living room floor lamp can be controlled by 2 methods: remote control and touch control. There is a magnetic holder on the lamp, so that you don't have to look for the remote control anywhere.

【Easy to Assemble and Long Life Use】All-in-one lamp body design, all you have to do is screw the individual elements together and connect the cable to the power supply. Our floor lamps has a quality build, the built in lights last 50,000 hours, good for 20 years with normal use.

【2 Year Product Warranty】We proudly stand behind all of our products 100%. Don't worry about Amazon's 30-day return mechanism, we are customers like you, we give you 2 years of extended warranty and offer a replacement or full refund if there are any quality-related problems.

Solution for remote control not working If the remote control does not work, it is possible that it is being interfered with by other remotes in the house or in the neighborhood. Step 1: Clear the code —— Reconnect the power adapter after unplugging it 5 times in a row. The floor lamp will flash quickly which means the code has been cleared successfully. Step 2: Match the code —— Long press the switch, the indicator light turns red. Plugged in while long pressing the switch. The light will flash, meaning the pairing is successful. Easy to Assemble Srecw the lamp head to the poleSrecw the remaining part of the poleScrew the base Memory Function This led floor lamp remembers the previous lighting settings every time you turn it on, eliminating the hassle of reconfiguring the lights. Humanized Magnet Design This modern floor lamp attaches securely to any metal surface, such as the lamp pole, eliminating the hassle of not being able to find the remote control. Sturdy and Thickened Base The base of this standing lamp is 10 inches in diameter and 1 inch high. This makes the lamp quite stable. Space Saving You can place the dimmable tall lamp next to a nightstand or sofa, saving space considerably.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5 stars for this floor lamp
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the SIBRILLE LED Floor Lamp, and I am thoroughly impressed with its quality and functionality. This contemporary standing lamp is not just a light source; it’s a statement piece that adds elegance and style to any room. Its sleek design and exquisite craftsmanship make it a work of art that enhances the ambiance of both my living room and bedroom.One of the most striking features of this lamp is its stepless dimmable functionality. The ability to adjust the brightness from a subtle 5% to a bright 100% and the color temperature from a warm white to a cold white is truly remarkable. This flexibility allows me to create the perfect lighting for any mood or activity. Additionally, the two adjustable lamp parts are a game-changer, enabling me to direct light exactly where it’s needed.Energy efficiency is another aspect where this lamp shines. The 20W uplighter is equivalent to a 100-watt incandescent bulb, offering brilliant illumination while saving energy. The dual control methods – remote and touch control – add convenience, and the magnetic holder for the remote is a thoughtful touch.Assembling the lamp was a breeze, thanks to its all-in-one design. I appreciate the long life span of the built-in lights, which are expected to last for 50,000 hours. This longevity, coupled with the 2-year product warranty, assures me of its quality and durability.In conclusion, the SIBRILLE LED Floor Lamp is an exceptional product that blends style, functionality, and energy efficiency. It’s a fantastic addition to my home, providing not just light but also a touch of modern elegance. The peace of mind that comes with the extended warranty is the icing on the cake.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and functionality
reviews.reviewText: I didn't have high expectations for this floor lamp, but was looking for something inexpensive and functional. This light fit that bill. I love the remote and the dual warmth settings with adjustable brightness as well as warmthness settings. Putting it together was super easy and I love the overall design

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes a really fun atmosphere !
reviews.reviewText: This is a cool lamp! It's just got a neat design in the way the two sides can move 360°. All the color and brightness options fit any need from reading to relaxing. I got this because my ceiling lights are too bright. (I had the dimmer switch replaced with a standard switch because the light plate on the wall got hot! Just moved in.) So I needed a versatile ability for lighting down in our rec room. I got this lamp and two table top ones that are similar. Together, I think I have a really nice decor and fun lighting.The price was super reasonable. The lamp seems sturdy, too. It also has a remote control. Grandkids are going to love that!The only concern is the power cord is pretty thin. My cats have taken out my Japanese Cherry tree lamp, and two turtle light strings, mistaking the thin cord for a string toy. So I examine the cord before I use it to be sure they didn't get ahold of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and bright enough. Could be better if the touch control has illumination as well
reviews.reviewText: I recently replaced my Ikea lamp with this new model, and I'm impressed with its easy installation and user-friendly features. The magnetic remote control is a standout, offering convenient dimming and color temperature adjustments. Its unique design includes two rotatable LED semi-circle rings, providing versatile lighting direction options. Overall, it's an excellent design.However, there are areas for improvement. Firstly, the lamp's weight is lighter than my previous one, causing it to wobble on carpet. A heavier base would enhance stability. Secondly, an illuminated touch control bar on the lamp post would be better than the current one, especially in dark rooms, making it easier to locate and use the control in low light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars "Brilliantly Versatile: SIBRILLE Modern Stepless Dimmable Floor Lamp Illuminates Every Room
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the SIBRILLE Modern Stepless Dimmable Standing Lamp from Amazon, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. This floor lamp has truly transformed the ambiance of my living room. The stepless dimming feature allows me to set the perfect level of brightness, whether I want soft, cozy lighting or bright illumination for reading or working.The 3000-6000K color temperature range is a game-changer, as it enables me to switch between warm and cool lighting to suit different moods and activities. The 20W LED light source is energy-efficient and produces a consistent, flicker-free glow, making it easy on the eyes.The rotatable feature is a fantastic addition as it allows me to direct the light precisely where I need it. The touch and remote control options provide convenience and flexibility, making it easy to adjust the lighting without leaving my seat. It's perfect for creating a cozy atmosphere for movie nights, or brightening up the room when I'm working from home.The sleek and modern design of the SIBRILLE lamp blends seamlessly with my decor, adding a touch of sophistication to my living room, bedroom, or office. It's also sturdily built and easy to assemble, which is a plus.Overall, I highly recommend the SIBRILLE Modern Stepless Dimmable Standing Lamp to anyone in need of a versatile and stylish floor lamp. It has quickly become a focal point in my living space, and I couldn't be more pleased with its performance and aesthetics.

The media could not be loaded. I’ve been looking for the perfect lamp for my living room and I’ve now found it. It’s SO easy to assemble. I love that the control is on the stem of it and you don’t have to step on a button. Also comes with a remote. Lights up my whole living room. So so so happy with it. It’s beautiful and modern
